nodes.text: Dreven was an individual who was a subscriber to, and commenter on, Cynabar's Droid Datalog. Commenting on the entry for the X1-Lioness TDL Nanny droid, Dreven relayed a rumor that they had heard involving the droid. The rumor revolved around corporate executives and Imperial officials reprogramming the droid into effective bodyguards, primarily by adding a military-grade targeting package.
